title: Before Vegas Shooting, Couple Traveled To Bundy Ranch Stand-Off
teaser: Last weekend, news was focused on Las Vegas, where a husband and wife went on a shooting spree.  We've since learned that the couple spent time at an armed stand-off on the cattle ranch east of Las Vegas owned by Cliven Bundy.  NPR's Arun Rath talks with Kirk Siegler about the shootings and his trip to the Bundy Ranch.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
